No transactions will be conducted between Users directly. When RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. is used in the Limited Items Exchange Services as a part of items to be exchanged, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. is entitled to a fee. However, if no RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. are used as part of the Trade, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. will not receive any fee in connection with the transaction. (See here for a more detailed explanation of Robloxâ€™s Trading System and the associated fees.)
      5. 

    5. 
Removal of Virtual ContentAll UGC and Roblox created content â€“ including all Virtual Items and In-Experience Items â€“ available for acquisition by Users on the Services. Virtual Content has no real world equivalent value and Users do not acquire any enforceable legal rights in and to any Virtual Content based on any transaction on the Services.. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. has the right, in its sole discretion, to suspend the availability of, or remove from the Services and your AccountA Roblox Account, which a User must create in order to access certain elements and functionality of the Services., any content (including without limitation Experiences, Virtual ContentAll UGC and Roblox created content â€“ including all Virtual Items and In-Experience Items â€“ available for acquisition by Users on the Services. Virtual Content has no real world equivalent value and Users do not acquire any enforceable legal rights in and to any Virtual Content based on any transaction on the Services., UGC Subscriptions, and UGCStands for â€œUser Generated Content.â€ UGC is content of any kind or nature, whether material, assets, or otherwise, that Users (including but not limited to Creators) upload to, create and publish on, or otherwise generate through or make available on the Services.) without advance notice. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. shall not be liable to any UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. for any losses you may experience because of such suspension or removal, and RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. is not required to refund any RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. or other funds that a UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has spent on any removed or suspended content, except where legally required.
      6. 

    


     
    

    <Section 4 of Creator Terms>
    


     
    

    1. Roblox Creator Economics
    

      

    1. Robux.
        

      1. 
Purpose of RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency.. RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. may be used only for purchasing the ServicesAny service or application offered by Roblox, such as those allowing Users to develop Virtual Content, connect with others, and use Virtual Content created by you and other Users. It includes websites on the roblox.com domain, our Roblox mobile, virtual reality and Xbox, and PlayStation apps, the Roblox Player, the Roblox Studio, and our other websites, products, software, applications, content, data feeds, and other services. provided by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. on the Platform. RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. cannot be used for purchasing any goods or services provided by any CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. or any other person other than RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V..

Earned Robux only include Robux you have earned in complete compliance with the Roblox Terms of Use, which include the Roblox Community Standards, through the Services from the direct sale or other monetization (e.g., EBP) of Virtual Content or other UGC that you create (either alone or with a Community) on the Services or Robux awarded by Roblox in designated promotional campaigns. This includes, but is not limited to, Robux earned from: Earnings from your listings in Marketplace or Creator Store, Engagement Based Payouts, In-experience purchases of virtual products, Ad revenue in the Publisher program, and Affiliate sales fees Robux acquired in ways other than monetization of compliant Virtual Content you created (such as Robux obtained from a membership plan or referral bonus, a purchase of Robux or gift card, or trading/selling virtual goods that you did not create) are not considered Earned Robux. This includes, but is not limited to, Robux obtained from: A gift card redemption or direct Robux purchase A monthly Robux grant as part of Premium membership Trading or resale of virtual products Gamepasses sold for template experiences with no legitimate user visits Violative content that was moderated The determination of whether Robux are Earned Robux resides solely in Robloxâ€™s discretion.       1. 

        Contributions to Roles and Unique Benefits: Three aspects apply to Robloxâ€™s sale of its services to enable access to and the use of all UGCStands for â€œUser Generated Content.â€ UGC is content of any kind or nature, whether material, assets, or otherwise, that Users (including but not limited to Creators) upload to, create and publish on, or otherwise generate through or make available on the Services. (except 2D Virtual ItemsAny UGC or Roblox created content such as clothing or digital items for use in connection with a Userâ€™s avatar available for acquisition on the Services. CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services.             • 

          •

            • 

          

        

        The above unique benefits do not apply to the sale of Classic ClothingLegacy 2D Virtual Items consisting of T-shirts, shirts, and pants designed and sold by Creators on the Services through the Avatar Shop., which consists of pants, shirts, and T-shirts. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. and the Platform.
        

        2. 

      2. 
Changes to Unique Benefits. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may, at any time upon notice to CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. (via any reasonable means), change the unique benefits.
        3. 

      3.

Random Virtual Items. Depending on UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. location, CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. (either with RobuxThe official currency of Roblox, which can be used to acquire Virtual Content or access to Experiences on the Services. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. or otherwise) (each, a â€œRandom Virtual Itemâ€). If a CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. provides the opportunity for a UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. to receive a Random Virtual Item, CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. must let Users know the odds of acquiring each type of Random Virtual Item available before a UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. is enabled to acquire a Random Virtual Item.
        By way of example only, if a Creatorâ€™s ExperienceInteractive content Published on the Services by Developers for the engagement and enjoyment of Users. allows a UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. to acquire a virtual marble that the UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. can then throw into a fountain to receive a Random Virtual Item, the CreatorAny User who creates, uploads, publishes, generates, or otherwise makes available UGC on the Services. Creators include but are not limited to Developers. must disclose the odds of the UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. receiving each type of Random Virtual Item before the UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. throws the marble into the fountain.

This includes, but is not limited to, Robux obtained from: A gift card redemption or direct Robux purchase A monthly Robux grant as part of Premium membership Trading or resale of virtual products Gamepasses sold for template experiences with no legitimate user visits Violative content that was moderated The determination of whether Robux are Earned Robux resides solely in Robloxâ€™s discretion. based on how engaging their Experience is. Robux are not a substitute for real currency, do not earn interest, and have no equivalent value in real currency. UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. already validly holds) and without effect to any notice, refund, compensation or liability RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may have to UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. under this Appendix C or binding applicable law. The remaining provisions of Section 3(e) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms. shall remain unaffected.

The current exchange rate and the general requirements, policies, and limitations of the DevEx ProgramStands for â€œDeveloper Exchange Program.â€ An exclusive, by-application-only, program through which Roblox allows approved Creators to exchange Earned Robux for real currency. This program is governed by the DevEx Terms. are published here.

  7. Limitation of liability
    

    Sections 13(b)-(c) and 14 of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. They cover items such as the use of Roblox Studio, the offering of Experiences and Virtual Content, and the use of music on the Services. shall not apply. Instead, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. shall be liable for damages exclusively according to this clause.
     
    

      

    1. Robloxâ€™s liability is unlimited for damages arising out of death, injury to body or health based on a breach conducted by a legal representative or designated agent of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., as well as for damages that arise from the lack of a guaranteed characteristic or in case of fraudulent intent.
      2. 

    2. Robloxâ€™s liability is unlimited for damages caused by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., a legal representative of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., or designated agent of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. by intent or gross negligence.
      3. 

    3. In case of a slight negligent breach of a contractual core duty RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. shall, except in the cases set out in this Section 7A, B and D of this Appendix C, only be liable to the amount of the typically foreseeable damage. Contractual core duties abstractly are such duties whose accomplishment enables proper fulfilment of the contract in the first place and whose fulfilment a contractual party regularly may rely on.
      4. 

    4. Liability pursuant to mandatory applicable law remains unaffected.
      5. 

    5. The limitation period for claims for damages shall be one (1) year, except in case of Section 7A, B and D of this Appendix C where the statutory statute of limitations shall apply.

  13. Right of withdrawal
    

    If UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. is a consumer (i.e. an individual who, in contracting with RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., is acting for purposes which are outside Userâ€™s trade, business, craft or profession), UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. may revoke all concluded contracts under the following conditions
     
    

      

    1. Information concerning the exercise of the right of withdrawal
        

      1. 

        Right of withdrawal. Subject to Section 13D, below, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has the right to withdraw from this contract within 14 days without giving any reason. The withdrawal period will expire after 14 days from the day of the conclusion of this contract. To exercise the right of withdrawal, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. must inform RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. (Roblox Corporation, Customer Support, 3150 S. Delaware St., San Mateo, CA 94403, or (888) 858-2569) of Userâ€™s decision to withdraw from this contract by an unequivocal statement (e.g. a letter sent by post). UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. may use the below-referenced model withdrawal form, but it is not obligatory. You can also electronically fill in and submit the model withdrawal form or any other unequivocal statement on our website through our Customer Support Form. If you use this option, we will communicate to you an acknowledgement of receipt of such a withdrawal on a durable medium (e.g. by letter) without delay.
        

        To meet the withdrawal deadline, it is sufficient for UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. to send Userâ€™s communication concerning Userâ€™s exercise of the right of withdrawal before the withdrawal period has expired.
        

        2. 

      2. 

        Effects of withdrawal. If UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. withdraws from this contract, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. shall reimburse to UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. all payments received from UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services., including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from Userâ€™s choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V.), without undue delay and in any event not later than 14 days from the day on which RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. is informed about Userâ€™s decision to withdraw from this contract. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. will carry out such reimbursement using the same means of payment as UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. used for the initial transaction, unless UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has expressly agreed otherwise; in any event, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. will not incur any fees as a result of such reimbursement.
        

        If you requested to begin the performance of services during the withdrawal period, you shall pay us an amount which is in proportion to what has been provided until you have communicated with us your withdrawal from this contract, in comparison with the full coverage of the contract.
        

        3. 

      

      2. 

    2. 

      Model withdrawal form
      

      (complete and return this form only if you wish to withdraw from the contract)
      

      To Roblox Corporation, Customer Support, 3150 S. Delaware St., San Mateo, CA 94403.
      

      - I/We(*) hereby give notice that I/We(*) withdraw from my/our(*) contract of sale of the following goods (*)/for the provision of the following service(*),

      - Name of consumer(s)
      - Address of consumer(s)
      

      - Signature of consumer(s) (only if this form is notified on paper)
      - Date
      

      ____
      (*) Delete as appropriate.
      

      3. 

    3. 
Exceptions from the right of withdrawal. The right to withdrawal may not exist in respect of distance or off-premise contracts for the supply of goods made to Userâ€™s specifications or clearly personalized.
      4. 

    4. 
Expiry of the right of withdrawal. Please note that the right of withdrawal expires, in the cases of:
        

      1. service contracts after the service has been fully performed but, if the contract places the UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. under an obligation to pay, only if the performance has begun with Userâ€™s prior express consent and acknowledgement that UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. will lose their right of withdrawal once the contract has been fully performed by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V..
        2. 

      2. contracts for the supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium if the performance has begun and, if the contract places UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. under an obligation to pay, where, (i) UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has provided prior express consent to begin the performance during the right of withdrawal period; (ii) UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has provided acknowledgement that UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. thereby loses Userâ€™s right of withdrawal; and (iii) RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. has provided UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. with confirmation of the contract, which also states Userâ€™s consent to RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. commencing performance of the contract before the expiry of the withdrawal period and confirmation of acknowledgement about the expiry of the right of withdrawal.

    17. 

  17. Repeated Misuse
    In addition to Section 2(g) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms., RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may refuse to process (i) appeals or (ii) illegal content notices submitted by Users or non-Users that repeatedly or egregiously misuse Robloxâ€™s appeal system or illegal content notice form. Examples of such misuse include frequently providing unsubstantiated notices or appeals, or abusive use of the appeals or notice system including submitting a high volume of appeals or notices without any information. Such refusals may take into consideration e.g. Userâ€™s historic use of the appeal system or illegal content notice form and the severity of the misuse. Refusal durations may vary depending on the degree of the violation. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may also suspend or terminate the accounts of Users who repeatedly publish illegal content. Such suspensions and terminations may take into consideration e.g. Userâ€™s historic content violations and the severity of the misuse. Suspension durations may vary depending on the degree of the violation. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. will notify you in advance of a suspension or termination, unless it is not appropriate for us to do so, and if you disagree with such action, you have the opportunity to appeal.
    18. 

  18. Recommendations and Ranking of Virtual Content
    Depending on the RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. feature (e.g. features like the Marketplace versus Experience Search), RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. uses different factors in order to provide Users and Creators the most relevant search results and recommendations. The category of factors and relative importance applied to each of them varies depending on the applicable search or recommendation feature. Furthermore, for some features, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. provides Users and Creators the option to modify the order of results or recommendations that are presented, which can be found in close proximity to the search or recommendation feature. See here for more information about how recommendations and ranking work on RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V..
    19. 

  19. Notification and Appeal
    In addition to Section 2(f) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms., whenever RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. restricts access to Virtual ContentAll UGC and Roblox created content â€“ including all Virtual Items and In-Experience Items â€“ available for acquisition by Users on the Services. Virtual Content has no real world equivalent value and Users do not acquire any enforceable legal rights in and to any Virtual Content based on any transaction on the Services., RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. notifies UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. of such decisions and provides UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. with an opportunity to appeal. In addition to considering the violation at hand when making such decisions, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. also considers Userâ€™s historical use of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. and whether UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has repeatedly violated RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. policies. Continued violations of certain policies may result in a stricter consequence (i.e., a warning, followed by a timeout, followed by a suspension, etc.). E.U. Users may appeal such decisions for up to 6 months after Robloxâ€™s initial decision. When reviewing an appeal request, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. holistically considers the severity of the violation, User's reason for appealing, and Userâ€™s behavior on the platform. Please note, in some circumstances, appeals may not be readily applicable â€” for example, a time-lapsed consequence such as a 20-minute timeout where the suspension has already been lifted.
    20. 

  20. Residents of France
    If after completing the Mandatory Informal Dispute Resolution process described in Section 11.a of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms., a dispute remains, residents of France may refer the matter free of charge to the following mediator: IEAM (Institut d'Expertise, d'Arbitrage et de MÃ©diation), 31bis-33 rue Daru 75008 Paris, https://www.ieam.eu/demande-de-mediation.

Appendix E (The United Kingdom)
    

  1. Priority
    If there is any inconsistency or conflict between the Roblox TermsThe terms and conditions that apply to and govern a Userâ€™s and Creatorâ€™s use of the Services. The Roblox Terms include the User Terms, Creator Terms, Roblox Community Standards, Roblox Privacy & Cookie Policy, and regional Supplemental Provisions and other Additional Terms. and the supplemental provisions, the supplemental provisions shall prevail.

    Sections 13(b)-(c) and 14 of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform.     1. Robloxâ€™s liability is unlimited for damages arising out of death, injury to body or health based on a breach conducted by a legal representative or designated agent of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., as well as for damages that arise from the lack of a guaranteed characteristic or in case of fraudulent intent.
      2. 

    2. Contractual core duties abstractly are such duties whose accomplishment enables proper fulfilment of the contract in the first place and whose fulfilment a contractual party regularly may rely on.
      4. 

    4. Liability pursuant to mandatory applicable law remains unaffected.
      5. 

    5. The limitation period for claims for damages shall be one (1) year, except in case of Section 7A, B and D of this Appendix E where the statutory statute of limitations shall apply.

  13. Right of withdrawal
    

    If UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. is a consumer (i.e. an individual who, in contracting with RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V., is acting for purposes which are outside Userâ€™s trade, business, craft or profession), UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. may revoke all concluded contracts under the following conditions
     
    

      

    1. Information concerning the exercise of the right of withdrawal
        

      1. 

        Right of withdrawal. Subject to Section 13D, below, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has the right to withdraw from this contract within 14 days without giving any reason. The withdrawal period will expire after 14 days from the day of the conclusion of this contract. To exercise the right of withdrawal, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. must inform RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. (Roblox Corporation, Customer Support, 3150 S. Delaware St., San Mateo, CA 94403, or (888) 858-2569) of Userâ€™s decision to withdraw from this contract by an unequivocal statement (e.g. a letter sent by post). UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. may use the below-referenced model withdrawal form, but it is not obligatory. You can also electronically fill in and submit the model withdrawal form or any other unequivocal statement on our website through our Customer Support Form. If you use this option, we will communicate to you an acknowledgement of receipt of such a withdrawal on a durable medium (e.g. by letter) without delay.
        

        To meet the withdrawal deadline, it is sufficient for UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. to send Userâ€™s communication concerning Userâ€™s exercise of the right of withdrawal before the withdrawal period has expired.
        

        2. 

      2. 

        Effects of withdrawal. If UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. withdraws from this contract, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. shall reimburse to UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. all payments received from UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services., including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from Userâ€™s choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V.), without undue delay and in any event not later than 14 days from the day on which RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. is informed about Userâ€™s decision to withdraw from this contract. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. will carry out such reimbursement using the same means of payment as UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. used for the initial transaction, unless UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has expressly agreed otherwise; in any event, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. will not incur any fees as a result of such reimbursement.
        

        If you requested to begin the performance of services during the withdrawal period, you shall pay us an amount which is in proportion to what has been provided until you have communicated with us your withdrawal from this contract, in comparison with the full coverage of the contract.
        

        3. 

      

      2. 

    2. 

      Model withdrawal form
      

      (complete and return this form only if you wish to withdraw from the contract)
      

      To Roblox Corporation, Customer Support, 3150 S. Delaware St., San Mateo, CA 94403.
      

      - I/We(*) hereby give notice that I/We(*) withdraw from my/our(*) contract of sale of the following goods (*)/for the provision of the following service(*),
      - Ordered on(*)/received on(*)
      - Name of consumer(s)
      - Address of consumer(s)
      

      - Signature of consumer(s) (only if this form is notified on paper)
      - Date
      

      ____
      (*) Delete as appropriate.
      

      3. 

    3. 
Exceptions from the right of withdrawal. The right to withdrawal may not exist in respect of distance or off-premise contracts for the supply of goods made to Userâ€™s specifications or clearly personalized.
      4. 

    4. 
Expiry of the right of withdrawal. Please note that the right of withdrawal expires, in the cases of:
        

      1. service contracts after the service has been fully performed but, if the contract places the UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. under an obligation to pay, only if the performance has begun with Userâ€™s prior express consent and acknowledgement that UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. will lose their right of withdrawal once the contract has been fully performed by RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V..
        2. 

      2. contracts for the supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium if the performance has begun and, if the contract places UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. under an obligation to pay, where, (i) UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has provided prior express consent to begin the performance during the right of withdrawal period; (ii) UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has provided acknowledgement that UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. thereby loses Userâ€™s right of withdrawal; and (iii) RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. has provided UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. with confirmation of the contract, which also states Userâ€™s consent to RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. commencing performance of the contract before the expiry of the withdrawal period and confirmation of acknowledgement about the expiry of the right of withdrawal.

They cover items such as the use of Roblox Studio, the offering of Experiences and Virtual Content, and the use of music on the Services. shall affect mandatory rights to remuneration for the use of copyrightable material.
    RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. reserves the right to text and data mining of the Platform and the ServicesAny service or application offered by Roblox, such as those allowing Users to develop Virtual Content, connect with others, and use Virtual Content created by you and other Users.     16. 

  16. Repeated Misuse
    In addition to Section 2(g) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms., RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may refuse to process (i) appeals (ii) illegal content notices or (iii) other complaints submitted by Users or non-Users that repeatedly or egregiously misuse Robloxâ€™s complaints and appeal system or illegal content notice form. Examples of such misuse include manifestly unfounded complaints, frequently providing unsubstantiated notices or appeals, or abusive use of the appeals or notice system including submitting a high volume of appeals or notices without any information. Such refusals may take into consideration e.g. Userâ€™s historic use of the appeal system or illegal content notice form and the severity of the misuse. Refusal durations may vary depending on the degree of the violation. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. may also suspend or terminate the accounts of Users who repeatedly publish illegal content. Such suspensions and terminations may take into consideration e.g. Userâ€™s historic content violations and the severity of the misuse. Suspension durations may vary depending on the degree of the violation. RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. will notify you in advance of a suspension or termination, unless it is not appropriate for us to do so, and if you disagree with such action, you have the opportunity to appeal.
    17. 

  17. Recommendations and Ranking of Virtual Content
    Depending on the RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. feature (e.g. features like the Marketplace versus Experience Search), RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. uses different factors in order to provide Users and Creators the most relevant search results and recommendations. The category of factors and relative importance applied to each of them varies depending on the applicable search or recommendation feature. Furthermore, for some features, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. provides Users and Creators the option to modify the order of results or recommendations that are presented, which can be found in close proximity to the search or recommendation feature. See here for more information about how recommendations and ranking work on RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V..
    18. 

  18. Notification and Appeal
    In addition to Section 2(f) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. The User Terms also cover some of the more technical legal terms that govern use of the Services, including intellectual property ownership, online safety, disclaimers and other very important legal terms., whenever RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. restricts access to Virtual ContentAll UGC and Roblox created content â€“ including all Virtual Items and In-Experience Items â€“ available for acquisition by Users on the Services. Virtual Content has no real world equivalent value and Users do not acquire any enforceable legal rights in and to any Virtual Content based on any transaction on the Services., RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. notifies UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. of such decisions and provides UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. with an opportunity to appeal. In addition to considering the violation at hand when making such decisions, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. also considers Userâ€™s historical use of RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. and whether UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has repeatedly violated RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. policies. Continued violations of certain policies may result in a stricter consequence (i.e., a warning, followed by a timeout, followed by a suspension, etc.). When reviewing an appeal request, RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. holistically considers the severity of the violation, User's reason for appealing, and Userâ€™s behavior on the platform. Please note, in some circumstances, appeals may not be readily applicable â€” for example, a time-lapsed consequence such as a 20-minute timeout where the suspension has already been lifted.
    19. 

  19. Userâ€™s right to claim for breach of contract
    
UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. may have the right to bring a claim for breach of contract against RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V.. For example, if RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. wrongfully removes or restricts access to Userâ€™s content or wrongfully suspends or bans UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. in breach of these terms, UserAny person or entity who uses or accesses the Services. has a right to bring a claim for breach of contract.

    The Online Safety Act 2023 (â€œOSAâ€) requires RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. to include certain information in its Terms of Use. Appendix F (Australia)
    

  1. Priority
    To the extent of any inconsistency or conflict between the Roblox TermsThe terms and conditions that apply to and govern a Userâ€™s and Creatorâ€™s use of the Services. The Roblox Terms include the User Terms, Creator Terms, Roblox Community Standards, Roblox Privacy & Cookie Policy, and regional Supplemental Provisions and other Additional Terms. and these supplemental provisions, the supplemental provisions shall prevail.
    2. 

  2. Compliance with the Online Safety Act
      

    1. 
RobloxThe Roblox Corporation, including its designated subsidiaries: Roblox Prepaid Company LLC, Roblox Godo Kaisha or Roblox Japan, Roblox Canada Inc., Roblox UK Limited (FKA Ceebr Limited), Roblox India Services Private Limited, Roblox Korea Limited, Roblox Australia Pty Ltd, and Roblox Netherlands B.V. has obligations under the Online Safety Act 2021 (Cth) (â€œAU OSAâ€) to take certain steps to keep our end-users safe from illegal or harmful content online. The content regulated by the AU OSA framework is divided up into different categories as follows:
        

      1. 

        â€œClass 1A materialâ€, which is any of the following:
        

          

        1. child sexual exploitation material;
          2. 

        2. pro-terror material; or
          3. 

        3. extreme crime and violence material.
          4. 

        

        Robloxâ€™s â€œChild Exploitationâ€, â€œTerrorism and Violent Extremismâ€, and â€œViolent Content and Goreâ€ Community Standards are broad and cover class 1A material as defined within the AU OSA framework, among other types of violations.
        

        2. 

      2. 

        â€œClass 1B materialâ€, which is either of the following:
        

          

        1. crime and violence material; or
          2. 

        2. drug-related material.
          3. 

        

        Robloxâ€™s Violent Content and Goreâ€ and â€œIllegal and Regulated Goodsâ€ Community Standards are broad and cover class 1B material as defined within the AU OSA framework, among other types of violations.
        

        3. 

      

      2. 

    2. Under the AU OSA, we are required to include certain provisions in our terms of use. These provisions are contained in the Roblox TermsThe terms and conditions that apply to and govern a Userâ€™s and Creatorâ€™s use of the Services. The Roblox Terms include the User Terms, Creator Terms, Roblox Community Standards, Roblox Privacy & Cookie Policy, and regional Supplemental Provisions and other Additional Terms. (which incorporate the Community Standards).
      3. 

    3. The Community Standards prohibit certain types of content, including class 1A and class 1B material, on the ServicesAny service or application offered by Roblox, such as those allowing Users to develop Virtual Content, connect with others, and use Virtual Content created by you and other Users. It includes websites on the roblox.com domain, our Roblox mobile, virtual reality and Xbox, and PlayStation apps, the Roblox Player, the Roblox Studio, and our other websites, products, software, applications, content, data feeds, and other services.. For Users in Australia, this means you must ensure the ServicesAny service or application offered by Roblox, such as those allowing Users to develop Virtual Content, connect with others, and use Virtual Content created by you and other Users. It includes websites on the roblox.com domain, our Roblox mobile, virtual reality and Xbox, and PlayStation apps, the Roblox Player, the Roblox Studio, and our other websites, products, software, applications, content, data feeds, and other services. are not used, whether by you or by another person using your AccountA Roblox Account, which a User must create in order to access certain elements and functionality of the Services., to solicit, access, distribute, or store class 1A material or class 1B material.
      4. 

    4. Consistent with section 2(c) of the User TermsTerms applicable to all Users which provide an overview and the associated rules for things like (i) account creation, (ii) using Robux to make purchases, (iii) trading Virtual Items, and (iv) activities prohibited on the Platform. It includes websites on the roblox.com domain, our Roblox mobile, virtual reality and Xbox, and PlayStation apps, the Roblox Player, the Roblox Studio, and our other websites, products, software, applications, content, data feeds, and other services. using your access credentials.
